name: Self Portrait Project
description: This project was mainly about a personality trait and being able to show it through graphic design with photoshop
The personality trait that I chose was night owl which is pretty obvious in the picture since it's just an owl in the night
The skills that are shown here is being able to create a composition with different elements and being able to make it look like it's one picture
A lot of work went into using the pen tool which enables me to crop images almost pixel perfect and paste it onto another image.
Then a lot of post processing effects to make the images blend together to make it seem like it's all in one image.
